subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. extended Tennessee’s probation by two years as part of additional penalties handed down after a ruling that a former assistant football coach provided impermissible benefits to a former prospect.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. extended Tennessee’s probation by two years as part of additional penalties handed down after a ruling that a former assistant football coach provided impermissible benefits to a former prospect.
